system.eav_groups: Deduced vaccine reactivity|fas fa-syringe,Risk factors|fas fa-smoking

field.comments: primary key
isolate name
country where strain was isolated
region inside country

this field is used in mapping so please try to ensure correct or most common spelling to facilitate GPS coordinates lookup. For US place names, please suffix 2-letter state code in square brackets, e.g. 'Dallas [TX]', to resolve ambiguities.
year of isolation
date sample was taken
ISO year (this may be different from the Gregorian year recorded in the year field) - value is determined automatically from the contents of the date_sampled field. This cannot be updated manually
week of the year - value is determined automatically from the contents of the date_sampled field. This cannot be updated manually
date received by laboratory (may be approximate)
result comes from non-culture diagnosis
epidemiological year of isolation in format mm/yyyy-mm/yyyy. This is only relevant for N. meningitidis and should be a 12 month period.
age in years
age range - this will be populated automatically if you enter a value for age_yr
month part of age (0-11) for patients under 1 year old
sex of patient/carrier

db.field:
sex
male female transgender male transgender female

field.comments: please put other diseases in comments field

db.field:
disease
carrier conjunctivitis disseminated gonococcal infection invasive (unspecified/other) meningitis meningitis and septicaemia meningococcal STI septicaemia uncomplicated gonorrhoea other

field.comments: biological source of sample - please put other sources in comments field

db.field:
source
blood CSF eye female reproductive tract joint fluid rectal swab sputum throat swab urethral swab other

epidemiology

species

Non-Neisseria sp.

field.comments: group determined by serological means. If you select 'other' please provide further details in the comments field. Values in this field from legacy data may have been determined by genotypic means, but for new data this should only represent values determined by serology.

db.field:
serogroup
A B C E W W/Y X Y Z H J K L NG other

field.comments: group determined by genotypic means

db.field:
genogroup
A B C E W W/Y X Y Z H J K L cnl NG

field.comments: details about genogroup prediction
capsular group value is determined automatically from the contents of the serogroup and genogroup fields. This cannot be updated manually

indicate if MIC result is greater than, less than, or equal the set value
MIC in mg/l

S: susceptible, standard dose; I: susceptible, increased exposure; R: resistant. Based on EUCAST defined breakpoints: Ng (S: <=0.125; R: >0.125). Field value will be populated automatically if MIC value is provided.
indicate if MIC result is greater than, less than, or equal the set value
MIC in mg/l

S: susceptible, standard dose; I: susceptible, increased exposure; R: resistant. Based on EUCAST defined breakpoints: Nm (S: <=0.125; R: >0.125); Ng (S: <=0.125; R: >0.125). Field value will be populated automatically if MIC value is provided.
indicate if MIC result is greater than, less than, or equal the set value
MIC in mg/l

S: susceptible, standard dose; I: susceptible, increased exposure; R: resistant. Based on EUCAST defined breakpoints: Nm (S: <=0.125; R: >0.125); Ng (S: <=0.125; R: >0.125). Field value will be populated automatically if MIC value is provided.
indicate if MIC result is greater than, less than, or equal the set value
MIC in mg/l

S: susceptible, standard dose; I: susceptible, increased exposure; R: resistant. Based on EUCAST defined breakpoints: Nm (S: <=2; R: >2). Field value will be populated automatically if MIC value is provided.
indicate if MIC result is greater than, less than, or equal the set value
MIC in mg/l

S: susceptible, standard dose; I: susceptible, increased exposure; R: resistant. Based on EUCAST defined breakpoints: Nm (S: <=0.03; R: >0.03); Ng (S: <=0.03; I: >0.03-0.06; R: >0.06). Field value will be populated automatically if MIC value is provided.
indicate if MIC result is greater than, less than, or equal the set value
MIC in mg/l

S: susceptible, standard dose; I: susceptible, increased exposure; R: resistant. Based on EUCAST defined breakpoints: Nm (S: <=0.25; R: >0.25); Ng (S: <=0.06; I: >0.06-1; R: >1). Field value will be populated automatically if MIC value is provided.
indicate if MIC result is greater than, less than, or equal the set value
MIC in mg/l

S: susceptible, standard dose; I: susceptible, increased exposure; R: resistant. Based on EUCAST defined breakpoints: Nm (S: <=0.25; R: >0.25). Field value will be populated automatically if MIC value is provided.
indicate if MIC result is greater than, less than, or equal the set value
MIC in mg/l

S: susceptible, standard dose; I: susceptible, increased exposure; R: resistant. Based on EUCAST defined breakpoints: Ng (S: <=64; R: >64). Field value will be populated automatically if MIC value is provided.
indicate if MIC result is greater than, less than, or equal the set value

indicate if MIC result is greater than, less than, or equal the set value
MIC in mg/l

S: susceptible, standard dose; I: susceptible, increased exposure; R: resistant. Based on EUCAST defined breakpoints: Nm (S: <=2; R: >2); Ng (S: <=0.5; I: >0.5-1; R: >1). Field value will be populated automatically if MIC value is provided.
